Comments_List: While we might generally agree that religion and politics is not so easily separated, this course allowed me to gain a deeper understanding of the mechanisms through which religion plays out in affairs of the state.

It was great that we could meet in a more informal setting, have coffee and discuss what we thought about the readings. I'm not sure if this is also a strength but the small class size was, I think, conducive for that. 
I think that there could be a small improvement to provide students with a couple of specific guiding questions for each week as they read the material.
Yes, I thought it was very informative for understanding the world that we live in today.
